title: Bakemesterskapet junior
overview: For the very first time, a Norwegian junior baking champion will also be crowned! Eight talented kids between the ages of 10 and 13 will take over the baking tent to compete until the flour flies, the laughter bubbles and the tears flow. In the junior Baking Championship, they give it their all to impress the judges with the most beautiful pastries. Along the way, they also become friends and each other's best helpers.
